attributes.action: Get Rid of Hospital Parking Charges
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to abolish hospital car parking charges as I believe that patients or people visiting patients in hospitals should not have to pay to park. Not only this, but the hospital parking charges are ridiculously high, with a fair amount of hospitals averaging at charging £3 for 1 hour. This needs to be stopped and the government should look at Scotland and how they don't charge.
